meanings.definition: To exaggerate the importance or quality of something.
meanings.sent1: Stop overhyping your video game skills; just play and have fun!
meanings.sent2: The company is overhyping their new product to attract more customers.
meanings.sent3: He kept overhyping his cooking skills, but the burnt dinner told a different story.
meanings.sent4: Her friends accused her of overhyping her singing talent, but she proved them wrong at the talent show.
meanings.sent5: The movie trailer was overhyping the action scenes, but they turned out to be quite boring.

meanings.definition: To promote or publicize something excessively.
meanings.sent1: The store is overhyping their sale to attract more shoppers.
meanings.sent2: The celebrity was overhyping her new book on social media.
meanings.sent3: The teacher joked that the student was overhyping the importance of the homework assignment.
meanings.sent4: The politician was overhyping his achievements to win more votes.
meanings.sent5: The company was overhyping the benefits of their new energy drink, but it tasted terrible.
